answers.answer: You really need to measure both your sugar levels and B12 levels in order to diagnose the problem.

question: I am 18 years old and am overweight. from past 6 months i am having blurry vision,dizziness,and sometimes constipationim recently having yellowish eyes along with eye strain and sometimes sour mouth.Is this diabetes or vitamin B12 deficiency?
title: Vitamin B12 Deficiency or Diabetes ?
